name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U: Export Tweets from User, Hashtag, and Search Term
name.en_GB: Export Tweet from User, Hashtag, and Search Term
name.es,es_419: Exportar Tweets de Usuario, Hashtag y Término de Búsqueda
name.ja: ユーザー、ハッシュタグ、検索語句からツイートをエクスポート
name.pt_BR,pt_PT: Exportar Tweets de Usuário, Hashtag e Termo de Busca

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export twitter tweets from any user, hashtag, or search term to a CSV file.
short.es,es_419: Exporta tweets de Twitter de cualquier usuario, hashtag o término de búsqueda a un archivo CSV.
short.ja: 任意のユーザー、ハッシュタグ、または検索語句からツイートをCSVファイルにエクスポートします。
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Exporte tweets do Twitter de qualquer usuário, hashtag ou termo de busca para um arquivo CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweet Export Pro allows you to quickly extract and export tweets from any account, hashtag, or search term as a CSV file with one click. 

🏆 Advantage
Our extension can export more data, as we comply with Twitter's rate limits.

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Extract and export tweets from any user to CSV
✓ Extract and export tweets from any hashtag to CSV
✓ Extract and export tweets from any search term to CSV
✓ Extract and export tweets within a selected date range
✓ Supports exporting longer tweets
✓ Automatic handling of rate limits, requiring no action from you

🟢 indicates the normal time interval for requests
🟠 indicates the cooldown period's time interval
🔴 indicates the time interval for request errors

🗂️ What You Get?
- ID
- Text
- Tweet URL
- Language
- Type
- Author Name
- Author Username
- View Count
- Bookmark Count
- Favorite Count
- Retweet Count
- Reply Count
- Quote Count
- Created At
- Source
- Hashtags
- URLs
- Media Type
- Media URLs

❓FAQ
How Can I Export All Tweets?
- By default, if the date option is not selected, all tweets will be exported. In theory, this extension can export all tweets, but when exporting a large amount of data, it may trigger Twitter's limits, causing the export to be interrupted. If this happens, you can use the date option to resume exporting tweets from where the last export was interrupted.

⚠️ Caution
To avoid being flagged by Twitter's risk control for frequent data exports, we suggest creating a dedicated Twitter account for exporting data.

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Disclaimer
Tweet Export Pro is an independent third-party chrome extension and has no affiliation with Twitter, Inc., or their affiliated companies. All trademarks and brand names mentioned are the property of their respective owners.
